data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZQNh3dmIkTQQ7kNvgHEnLNl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCMgfSMGEGudgB8UthUaQAzw7qgowODeMMqpFCHWn_cuA&oe=66FA89B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=totX2oJTA-8Q7kNvgHB_3i0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAy3ETArCjfECYWqrvz6huTE6t_NQFlXffzVdflKuPQtw&oe=66FA9752)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rxKRXlhLSIcQ7kNvgHoexqb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9dSG1rbFxRIbUKR-NSRzj95kcGt-TKnroWNbkIZzcaQ&oe=66FA8289)
